recipesJson.name: Simple sugar cookie (Raspberry Edition)
recipesJson.author: noxx1993
recipesJson.description:
This Mix was inspired by ID10-T recipe "Simple Sugar Cookie" 
https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/10644#simple_sugar_cookie_by_id10_t

I used this base and added a couple of bits to it. 

INW - Raspberry (My favourite raspberry of choice)
TPA - Cheesecake (Graham Crust)

I added the cheesecake to add a slight chewy and doughy note to the cookie

Hope you enjoy
